DependsOn: Component, ImagingLevel1_id, Filename, Image Assay Type, Image Protocol Link, Image Platform Model, Image Platform Manufacturer, Image Software, ImagingChannel Key

Description: Unique row identifier, used as a primary key for record updates

Valid Values: CODEX, CyCIF, ExSeq, GeoMX-DSP, H&E, IHC, IMC, MERFISH, MIBI, mIHC, MxIF, Not Applicable, SABER, t-CyCIF

Description: Protocols.io ID or DOI link to a free/open protocol resource describing in detail the assay protocol (e.g. surface markers used in Smart-seq, dissociation duration,  lot/batch numbers for key reagents such as primers, sequencing reagent kits, etc.) or the protocol by which the sample was obtained or generated.
The specific model of the instrument used to carry out an imaging experiment.
Producer of the imaging equipment that was used to generate the digital image
The name of the software package that was used to capture, generate, and process the image.
